author: arj
msg: GroupPrincipal gains a two-argument constructor that accepts the wiki name as the first parameter.

author: arj
msg: GroupPrincipal gains a two-argument constructor that accepts the wiki name as the first parameter. WikiSession.guestSession() changes to guestSession(WikiEngine). This required small tweaks to a few classes, notably the RPC handlers and parts of the Auth code.

author: arj
msg: WikiSession.guestSession() changes to guestSession(WikiEngine). This required small tweaks to a few classes, notably the RPC handlers and parts of the Auth code.

author: arj
msg: Various classes receive small code tweaks in preparation for upcoming builds. WikiContext gains three new group-related contexts; WikiEngine gains code to initialize CommandResolver and a related accessor; Authentication/Authorization manager get slight tweaks.

author: arj
msg: SessionMonitor achieves escape velocity and becomes its own class, breaking free of WikiSession's gravity.
